data.name: Breaking Wheel OST
data.detailed_description: This is the Soundtrack in MP3 format for Breaking Wheel. This is a way we can help support the audio team behind the game. As we add more music to the game this file will be updated as well. Currently contains 40+ tracks, some of which are currently not even used in the base game. Enjoy.
data.about_the_game: This is the Soundtrack in MP3 format for Breaking Wheel. This is a way we can help support the audio team behind the game. As we add more music to the game this file will be updated as well. Currently contains 40+ tracks, some of which are currently not even used in the base game. Enjoy.
